message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DM, cs.GR, cs.SG, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with shape analysis tasks and investigates the topological features of discretized spaces using PL Morse theory and discrete Morse theory. Therefore, cs.CG (Computational Geometry) is a likely sub-category. The paper also discusses critical points and critical simplices, which are central concepts in discrete Morse theory, making cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) another likely sub-category. The paper also mentions building a discrete gradient vector field algorithmically, which falls under cs.GR (Graphics) and cs.SG (Sound and Graphics). Finally, the paper discusses an optimality condition, which involves optimization techniques, making cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) a possible sub-category as well.
